notesShort: B-Air is formidable but not unbeatable. Force her to B-Air early with jumps, then crouch and D-Tilt to force her to B-Air late. Both strategies are used together to mix up your walling.
Lazy techs in place or roll aways get you rollered. Miss a tech on purpose if they get roller happy to avoid this trap.
Inkling's Booyah (U-Throw -> U-Air) percent on Shulk is actually pretty good. Make sure you have Shield art **from 114-137%**. This window changes to **109-134%** if in Jump or Buster art.

fsmash.notes: Ranges are very generous during the ledge animation (standard during normal hang)
